reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pregnancy mask
reviews.reviewText: Great hydrating mask for pregnancy and postpartum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cream is even good to use after pregnancy it's so light and feel mosturiz8ng leaving your skin so smooth and glowing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soothing and relaxing, even when you're pregnant
reviews.reviewText: This is a calming, hydrating mask. It doesn’t have a strong odor, which is a blessing when you’re pregnant because the hormones can turn even scents you love into strange or gross fragrances. The moisture soaks into the skin and leaves it feeling soft and refreshed; I don’t know if I looked any better to a stranger on the street, but when I touched my face I could feel that the skin was smoother and softer.Considering the ingredients listed, I think the masks are a bit pricey, but they sure do feel nice and relaxing after a long, exhausting day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’m not pregnant, but wanted to try this toner because of the rosewater and collagen. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized after the first use. Only thing I disliked is that it left the faint scent for a brief moment, but it went away. I absolutely love the container itself! It’s worth giving it a try. I’m going to keep using it to see what it does for my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very refreshing and smoothing effect. No heavy feeling and no intense scents coming from it.
reviews.reviewText: I am not pregnant but my face needs some hydration as well!I like this brand. I have tried their hand cream and I found it very helpful, and it is the same with this mask.It use it after micro needling and use it along with a roller to get a nice soothing a cooling effect.It has ingredients that I love, like cocoa butter, vitamin e, Vitamin C, Collagen, Folic Acid, Rosewater, Licorice, Avocado oil and Jojoba oil.It doesn't feel heavy on the skin and it doesn't have any strong scent coming from it.I leave it in my skin for around 30 minutes and after removing it I apply the remaining product that is left in the package. It takes quite some time to fully dry but it is worth it.Afterwards, I apply my eye cream and goat milk cream to complete my skin care session. And the next day when I wake up in the morning I enjoy the brightness, smoothness and softness effect that is left in my skin.This is worth it and seems to work nice in sensitive skin. There is of course, no need to be pregnant to use it and get the best out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that these masks have a plastic backing on them so it’s easy to unfold them out of the package, and they feel wonderful while they’re on the skin, but they definitely leave a gunky residue after the product has settled in and you’re not wearing the mask anymore.I’ve tried both patting the remaining product into my skin, which is what most of these masks require, as well as allowing it to absorb and dry on its own, and in both circumstances I would find dried product peeling off of my skin not long after.The other day I tried the patting method and after I was sure everything was absorbed I put on a sunscreen face lotion, and did my makeup as I normally would and there were pieces of my “face“ peeling throughout the day. During this pregnancy, I think I’ll stick with naturally-based DIY face masks instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Palmer’s never disappoints, from the cradle to the grave 👍!
reviews.reviewText: **Even my kitty enjoys the smell :) see photo. The scent is light & fresh. Not at all over-bearing or harsh**I’ve used palmer’s tummy butter on my belly, thigh, chest & arms skin for over 13 years now, since I was pregnant with twins. Let me tell you how I raved about it. Full-term, not a one stretch mark 🙌. Loved the smell & the moisture, so I continued forward with it. I’ll try any Palmer’s product because the quality & results are always there, and always impressive. I completely & totally love and trust the brand!I needed a good, light moisturizer for my face.. and I got just that. Pregnant or not, skin goes through changes as we go through life. Trust Palmer’s to care for your skin from pregnancy to old age. This stuff is light, soothing, non-irritating & worth the money. A little bit goes a long way, and I don’t feel at all greasy, and it does not at all burn my sensitive, rosacea prone skin. The texture of this cream is not heavy.. it’s perfection & blends into skin like a dream!I highly recommend this facial moisturizer to ALL women of every age, race & skin type. Great hydration without any ick left behind 👍. Pregnancy does reek havoc on skin.. as do hormonal changes later on in life. Palmer’s got you covered every step of the way.5 stars!!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️** I hope my review has been helpful 😊.**

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These masks leaves your skin feeling refreshed and hydrated
reviews.reviewText: These masks are nice and cover your whole face, although I do have a smaller face and these were big but this was not an issue as I just folded those areas. I have to say that they smell nice and not over bearing and they have lots of moisture. These are very nice to have while pregnant and after to restore moiisture.
